00009 /*
00010  * This protocol is implemented by objects that can be serialized into a representation suitable
00011  * for transmission over a REST request. Suitable serializations are x-www-form-urlencoded and
00012  * multipart/form-data.
00013  */
00014 @protocol RKRequestSerializable
00015 
00019 - (NSString*)HTTPHeaderValueForContentType;
00020

00034

00040
